definitions: the state of existing in or containing plentiful quantities of something desirable

examples.text: tropical gardens with an enormous richness of flora and fauna
the richness and diversity of human culture

shortDefinitions: state of existing in plentiful quantities

definitions: the quality of containing a large amount of fat, spices, sugar, etc.

examples.text: the sorrel cuts through the richness of the sauce

shortDefinitions: quality of containing large amount of fat etc.

definitions: the quality of being pleasingly deep or strong

examples.text: her voice retains a wonderful richness of tone
all are amazed at the richness of the colors

shortDefinitions: quality of being pleasingly deep or strong
